name: CRASHER GOOSE
description:
READ ME! HONK.TXT CONTENT:

Custom Batch File Set Made By Me (Bondbros01) To Run The Desktop Goose Program.

I did not make this program, I only made the Custom ad-don files for the original program is by samperson:

samperson.itch.io/desktop-goose

Let either of these run long enuf and IT WILL CRASH YOUR DEVICE

HOLD ESC TO EMERGENCY EVICT THE GOOSE, OR OPEN THE "Close Goose.bat" File

To Activate The "Slow Crasher Goose" / "Fast Crashe Goose" Move To The Targets Desktop.

Once The Entire Folder Is On The Root Of The Desktop ((Not In A Sub Folder)Program CAN Be In A Sub Folder As Of Update 1.3 And above.)

Open The Folder And Launch Either The "Slow Crasher Goose.bat" Or The "Fast Crasher Goose.bat (Or If you Have 1.3 Or Above the Custom Crasher.)"

THE FOLDER NAME CAN NOT BE CHANGED OR IT WILL NOT WORK

(EDIT - The Folder Name And Location Can Be Changed To Pretty Much Anything :)

!!! INFORMATION !!!

Crash Time

"Slow Crasher Goose.bat" - - - - Speed = Every 10 Sec It Will Open A New Goose - - - A While

"Fast Crasher Goose.bat" - - - Speed = Every 00 Sec It Will Open A New Goose - - - Less Than 30 Sec

"Custom Crasher Goose.bat" - - - Speed = Custom Delay Before Start, Custom Time Between Opening New Goose Program. (V 1.3 and above ONLY)

In Version 1.4 And Above Updates:

A Warning Will Pop up every 15 seconds for all of the crashers.

(Except for the Fast Crasher, The Warning will Only appear Once at the opening of the fast crasher)

Colors Have Been Changed To Green On All Of The Pop Ups

Image Of The CRASHER GOOSE Logo Has Been Uploaded Into The Bat Files

And will appear every time you launch a bat file.

Special Version Of the Desktop Goose Made By Bondbros01.

(desktop goose / Mods not made by bondbros01)

This is for Educational Purposes Only. I Take No Responsibility For What You Do With This.

!!! INITIAL RELEASE 1.1 INFO !!!

First Available Beta For The Desktop Goose Crasher.

Custom Added Features, Including -

Slow Crasher - Slowly Adds More Desktop Goose Programs Every 10 Seconds.

Fast Crasher - Instantly Lag Out A Top Grade PC In Seconds.

custom Version Of The Desktop Goose By: Bondbros01

Original Desktop Goose By: Sam Chiet

This Program Is Made To Be A Meme And Educational Purposes Only.

Discord Group: https://discord.gg/sZN7kzn

!!! I DID NOT MAKE THE DESKTOP GOOSE OR ANY OF THE AD-DONS FOR THIS PROGRAM !!!

(With the exception Of The Crasher's)

ALL OF THE MODS INCLUDED CAN BE FOUND ON THE DESKTOP GOOSE WEBSITE.
